FontString.name: TheoryCraftGenDesc
FontString.text: By default TheoryCraft will show button text on all spells. To limit it to a select few, type the spell names in the edit box below. Click 'Add All Spells' to see the format.

FontString.name: TheoryCraftCustomDesc
FontString.text: ALT-clicking an item link or item button will have TC equip it, updating your tooltips accordingly.

Scripts.OnUpdate: if not TheoryCraft_Data.TalentsHaveBeenRead then TheoryCraft_UpdateTalents() end TheoryCraft_UpdatedThisRound = nil
